msbt.message: You def put a ton of work into this room, .<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow! Check out your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Your tastes are so unique! You're like nobody else and I SO admire that.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made from locally picked mushrooms?! How trendy! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Eat local, build local!
Your <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is SOOOO pretty!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ohmigosh! It'd be suuuuper sparkly in the sunlight! Until it melted!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Zen-styled stuff is SOOO relaxing. You just chill outclose your eyesand meditate.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />B-T-dubs? Meditating is the best! It totes calms! Me! Down!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your reminds me of when I used to make castles with wooden blocks!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'd build the castle, then hide inside and listen to old records.<10_4 /> I had a LOT of blocks.But who knew you could make real furniture with them?!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Antique furniture is, you know, from back before the internetor running waterbut it's also TOTES trendy!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?! BOO! NO! UGH! BOOOOO!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sorry, ! I'm not critiquing your totally fine interior- design choices, I promiseI thought I was having a nightmare! I thought I was back in school and hadn't studied for the test!<10_4 /> Yikes!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I L-O-V-E love your !Def gives me those fab vacation vibes!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Once I become the most famous pop star in the world, I am SO always going to be relaxing at a resort!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? I've never thought about working from home, but it's a fab idea!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You could blast music really loud, run around and scream, take long video-game breaksHa! If I worked from home, I'd never get any work done!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your Wow. Soooo wild, but also kind of warm and homey. Perfect!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />SQUEEEEEEE! I. LOVE. YOUR. !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I! LOVE! IT! SO! MUCH! SQUEEEEeeeeeeeeee Whew. Wore myself out there.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your smells SO. GOOD.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is this made of real fruit? <10_4 />Can I have a taste?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I never knew you were into retro styles, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />"Retro" means it looks old, but it's probs actually made of new stuff. Like a lot of folks you see on TV!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Toy-themed furniture? So. Mega. Fab.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />When I get excited about toy-themed stuff, I'm allam I an adult? Or am I a kid? I don't know!Actually, most folks on this island probably can't answer that question!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is made out of shells?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I listen closelyI can almost hear the sound of waves<10_4 />and someone singing a sea shanty?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! You're SO vogue, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I saw on TV that furniture like that is, like, fancy? And also schmancy? They call it "fancy-schmancy."
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I tote-totes-TOTALLY adore your ! Sooo uber eggy cute! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's like every day is Bunny Day when you're in this room, !
